nodes.text: The Plexis system was located in the Southern Core portion of the Core Worlds. It contained the astronomical object Plexis, which served as the homeworld of House Neuvalis, a chapter house of the Bounty Hunters' Guild.
The Plexis system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-13.
